Description: AWS Cloudformation script to deploy a VPC

VPCOctet.Description: First two octets of the VPC
VPCOctet.ConstraintDescription: must only be the first two octets without a trailing period

VGWId.Description: ID of the VGW to attach to the VPC

AttachVPN.Description: Boolean to attach VGW to create VPN

AttachIGW.Description: Boolean to attach an Internet Gateway to the VPC

DNSServers.Description: Comma separated list of DNS server IP addresses

VPCTenancy.Description: The tenancy of the instances launched in this VPC.  If dedicated, all instances will be dedicated tenancy regardless of the tenancy option you specify when you launch the instance

EnableVPCDNSSupport.Description: Is Amazon DNS resolution supported for the VPC

EnableDNSHostnameSupport.Description: Allow instances launched in the VPC get Amazon DNS hostnames

Region.Description: Region to deploy to.  First 3 letters of region in capitals, e.g. SYD, IRE

DataSubnetIDs.Description: Comma separated list of Data subnets

SecuritySubnetIDs.Description: Comma separated list of Application subnets

WebSubnetIDs.Description: Comma separated list of Web subnets

AdminSubnetIDs.Description: Comma separated list of Admin subnets
